How to save a video to &base_app_name;
Copy the video link and then open &base_app_name;. When a prompt pops up at the top of the screen, touch it to save the video.
On TikTok, Instagram, or Facebook, find the video you like and touch Share. Then select [Save to &base_app_name;].

Please note that all files you have saved are from the Internet, and &base_app_name; does not assume any responsibility for the legality of their content. Please notify us by email should you find any infringing files or links.

After you’ve tapped the button, the background process will be interrupted, and &base_app_name; will restart.
Please note that &base_app_name; is not responsible for the legality of the files you lock and save. If you find any files or links infringing your rights, you can give feedback by email.
